quest.name: Child's Play
journal: The Dotharli warrior wants to see just how capable you are.
Head for the Dusk Throne without straying from the designated path.
Present the small leather sack to the Dotharli warrior.
objectives: Head for the Dusk Throne without straying from the designated path.
Present the small leather sack to the Dotharli warrior.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: You are a womanman that has danced with death many a time. I can tell from your eyes.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: We Dotharl respect all skilled warriors equally. Race does not come into it. I would very much like to witness your strength firsthand.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Should you be willing, I would have you participate in a trial. It should be no trouble for youâ”€it is a test made for our tribe's youngest. You simply need head to the Dusk Throne and collect a small package.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Speak with me if you feel up to the challenge.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Ready to test your might? Head for the Dusk Throne's chest and bring back the sack I have placed there.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Deviate from the path and you shall fail the trial. You may attempt the test as many times as you like.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Head for the goal, taking care not to step outside of the designated path. Riding on a mount shall also cause you to fail the trial. Talk with the Dotharli warrior if you wish to reattempt the test.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Do not lose heart. You may attempt the trial as many times as you wish.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Do you have the sack? Only it can serve as proof that you have passed the test.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Do you have the sack? Only it can serve as proof that you have passed the test.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Skillfully done. Let us return to Dotharl Khaa.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: The trial tests participants' bravery and their ability to cope with unforeseen obstacles. As I expected, it did not trouble you in the slightest.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: Dotharl who complete the trial receive no rewards, but as you are an outsider, I will make an exception.

dialogue.name: INSTRUCTOR02788
dialogue.text: I shall not forget you, Forename. You will always be welcome in Dotharl Khaa.
